name: Check Bot
details:
The **Checklist Bot** Power-Up adds new features to a Trello board:
- **Checklist templating**    - assign a checklist *template* to each list    - automatically add the *template*'s checklists to any card added or moved to a list- **Automated actions on check** when an item is checked in a checklist such as:    - Move the card to another list in the board    - Move the card to another board    - Assign a label    - Archive the card

At OCTO we have developped this power-up for internal use (HR hiring) and for our customers (Factory workshops management, Administrative processes) and share it with you!
If you use Trello for process management, check it out
. Powered by OCTO Technology (LJE & CDU)
details2:
Raise your productivity with **[Butler for Trello](https://butlerfortrello.com)**:

- Customize Trello with buttons that perform your favorite actions on a card or on the board.

- The Butler automatically analyzes your recent usage and recommends buttons to save you clicks and time.

- Sort lists by due date, title, time in list, votes, labels or the value of a custom field.

- Create/copy/move/archive cards, add labels/checklists/due dates, assign to a member, and much more.
